Audio.Locality: Quebrada San Rafael (cerca de Hacienda La Carbonera), canon del rio Tochecito, Toche, Cajamarca, Tolima
Audio.Author: Bernabe Lopez-Lanus
Audio.Comments: Two? birds flying very high (aprox. 3100 m a.s.l.) above Quebrada San Rafael from Quebrada La Reforma. Birds not seen in detail. The longer and 'sweet' notes look like this species and not the Bolborhynchus ferrugineifrons flight calls. After study the sonograms of both species I vote for Hapalopsittaca fuertesi. Certainty 99%. In the background Andigena hypoleuca. Two days previous, at 07:17 hs I saw two birds of the same species, flaying very high too, above Quebrada San Rafael and Quebrada Pajarito, but not was posible make a recording. Lopez-Lanus (in prep.)
